answers.answer: seeing the blood vessels in your eyes is normal under many circumstances and is an entopic phenomena.Use the search feature and Google that term to learn more.JCH III MD

Hi Dr. Hagan; this is barb again; is it normal for the air bubble to swim around fast and take off and break up to smaller bubbles?   I feel as if this is not going to go away.  It takes a long time; I did talk to my rs and they said it should all be gone this summer.  Barb.
Your retina surgeon is in the best position to give specific advise.JCH IIIMD

question: I often see flashing light in my eye . But the really odd thing is that i can see the intricate pattern of my arteries in my eye. This usually occurs with heavy heart beats and is in rythm with pulse. Or it also occurs if i am running and taking impact on knees and would occur whenever i take impact. i can only see arteries  in lower section of my eye only. The arteries look red with black outlineRecently, my eyesight weakened slightly. My optician thought i might have diabetes, which i dont.Does anyone know why i could see arteries in my eyes?
title: Flashing lights- seeing arteries
